about_the_game:
In a world filled with dangerous dungeons and fearsome monsters, the bravest adventurers venture forth to battle, gathering rare materials and treasures. As a guild shop owner, your role isn’t to fight, but to trade, craft, and collect. Manage your own shop, sell precious materials, and craft gear to support the adventurers in their perilous quests while growing your business into the ultimate supply hub for adventurers.

Run Your Own Guild Shop

Your shop is the cornerstone of the adventuring world, supplying essential materials for crafting and trade. Supply materials such as minerals, woods, and rare monster remains harvested from victorious dungeon raids. Carefully manage your inventory, ensuring a balance between common and high-value materials to attract customers of all kinds. Additionally, convert the value of raw materials into the gear that adventurers need through the crafting process. The success of your store depends on your ability to restock efficiently, set strategic prices, and meet market demand.

Craft and Sell Powerful Gear

Transform raw materials into high-quality gear that adventurers need through crafting. With the right materials, you can craft powerful swords, armor, shields, and helmets to sell in your shop. Manage your resources wisely—decide whether to sell raw materials directly or use them to craft high-value gear that attracts more customers. A well-stocked shop with top-tier equipment will become the go-to destination for adventurers seeking the best gear.


Supply the rarest materials, craft powerful gear, and build a shop that every adventurer relies on. Master the market, refine your crafting, and become the top supplier of legendary materials. The fate of your business is in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
